function RYU_EP05_15()
    -- .転-2【2月第4週】「姫皇の凶行」
    SaveData.Title = "姫皇の凶行"

    -- //BG：大講堂正面（スポットライトなし）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：ざわめき
--PLAY_SE("SEf004.wav")
--WAIT(1000)

    -- //BG：ステージ上
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ae")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-2800,400)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（驚き）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1398.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Quite a crowd has gathered. Did they all come just to hear Senior Uran's speech?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2125.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I wonder. I think there are some co-education supporters mixed in for reconnaissance purposes though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：リラ（驚き）、ウラン（笑顔）
    -- LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)


PLAY_VOICE("uran_0905.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I don't mind who they are. I simply intend to convey my true feelings to everyone." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2126.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "By the way... has anyone seen Hiyu-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    MSG([[ Both Uran-san and Lira-san shook their heads in response to my question. ]])

    MSG([[ Since the day I revealed my gender, I hadn't seen Hiyu-san even once. ]])

    MSG([[ There were even rumors that she had withdrawn from school, and no one knew her whereabouts. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0906.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I understand Hiyu-san's feelings." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0907.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "The feelings of not being accepted, feeling betrayed, and yet still loving... so many emotions swirl within her chest, making it a painful time." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01fc")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0908.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "But surely, just as I was eventually able to move on... Hiyu-san will come back to us." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0909.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "After all... Hiyu-san was the very first to notice Erika Ikusa's charm." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2127.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes... that's true." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ If it weren't for Hiyu-san, the reputation of 'Erika Ikusa' wouldn't have spread this far. ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san was always by my side. I wanted to meet and talk with her as soon as possible. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1399.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hey, hey! Could that be?!" ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    MSG([[ I was speechless as I looked at the center of the stage Lira-san pointed to. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")

    -- //BU：アルメリア（邪悪笑み）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01na")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005",500,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav",1000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Haaaaai~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Yuriai Private Academy everyone~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Have you been well~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])


PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Everyone's idol, Hermes-chan, has returned~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2128.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-Is that really Hermes-san...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It was definitely Hermes-san's appearance that we know well, but I was surprised at the change in atmosphere. ]])

    MSG([[ Clearly, there was less vitality than before. It was like a completely different person. ]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ The audience seemed to sense Hermes-san's transformation, and an unprecedented murmur spread throughout the auditorium. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ga")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "W-What...? That reaction... I am Hermes too... no, I am the real Hermes..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Well, whatever! Today isn't a live performance; I've prepared a surprise! Look at the screen on stage!" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san pointed at a pure white screen. ]])

    MSG([[ The projector's light hit it, revealing a figure I know well. ]])

    MSG([[ It was none other than―― ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2129.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Th-That is――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：お着替えエリカの加工 154
LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI154a")
LAYER_POSITION(55,0,200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
WAIT(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01na")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Many of you remember this photo, right~? Actually, this photo hides a shocking and surprising truth!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "This isn't just proof of a simple underwear mix-up. The truth is... it proves that Erika-chan is a boy<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Erika-chan is actually a boy~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
--PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    MSG([[ The audience burst into an uproar. ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（焦り）、ウラン（焦り）
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BG024ae")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BUS_RYU01ga")
LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUS_RIR07ga")
LAYER_MASK(56,"frame00",55,65)
LAYER_SCALE(55,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(55,-1600,400)
LAYER_POSITION(60,1800,-100)
LAYER_POSITION(65,1450,-100)
LAYER_POSITION(56,1000,-100)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-2600,400,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,800,-100,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,450,-100,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(56,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1400.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "S-She said it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0910.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "She's done it... I never imagined she'd resort to such a forceful method." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2130.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Why would Hermes-san do something like this...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Ignoring our confusion, Hermes-san continued speaking sharply with great delight. ]])

STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-1600,400,500,Ease.InCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,1800,-100,500,Ease.InCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,1450,-100,500,Ease.InCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(56,1000,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
LAYER_MASK(56,"")

    -- //BU：アルメリア（邪悪笑み）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01na")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0059.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Come on, everyone, remember! Uran-chan and Erika-chan were lovey-dovey in the academy, right~?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "That was showing off the only boy-girl couple in this academy to everyone~" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Hehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> The leader of the conservative faction being secretly in love with a boy is just soooo thrilling~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ The uproar in the auditorium intensified. ]])

    MSG([[ This is bad. They are clearly fanning distrust towards me and Uran-san. ]])

    MSG([[ If this continues, the anger will be directed at us. That would make victory in the Princess Election hopeless. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //BU：リラ（焦り）、ウラン（焦り）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ae")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-2800,400)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ga")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2131.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I will immediately get on stage to explain myself!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1401.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "N-No, you can't!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san grabbed my arm as I tried to rush to the center of the stage and stopped me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1402.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "When it comes to this kind of thing, the person involved can't explain it themselves. Someone else has to properly explain it or it'll backfire!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0911.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Lira-san is right. I understand how you feel, but please restrain yourself here." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2132.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "B-But if this continues, even Uran-san's reputation will be damaged because of me..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)
    -- //SE：どよめき
--PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Is it true that that Erika-nee-sama is a boy?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "I've always thought that photo seemed suspicious." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "It's no good... I can't trust anything anymore..." ]])

    MSG([[ Even as we speak, waves of confusion are spreading noticeably. ]])

    MSG([[ To think I'd cause trouble again because of my cross-dressing... I can't help but feel frustrated at my own powerlessness. ]])

    MSG([[ However, the situation did not end there. ]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")

    -- //BU：アルメリア・邪悪笑み
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01na")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Now, some people might still be doubtful with just this photo, right? So we've invited a special guest to convince those kids too!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "It's Hiyu Shinosaki, Erika-chan's chief knight who also appears in this photo! Please welcome her!" ]])


STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

    -- //BU：アルメリア・邪悪笑み、ヒユ・真剣
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01na")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ba")
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2133.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "H-Hiyu-san!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The unexpected person appeared on stage, and I couldn't hide my surprise. ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san stood side by side next to Hermes-san at the center of the stage. ]])

    MSG([[ Her expression was unusually stern, almost filled with resentment. Could it be...? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2134.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Did you switch to the co-education side out of resentment against me?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I felt painful understanding, as it was not an illogical choice. ]])

    MSG([[ But this is a consequence of my own doing. If Hiyu-san destroys me, then it is my own fault. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Come on, Hiyu-chan, spill it! Is Erika-chan really a boy or a girl!? Let’s have the truth out in the open!" ]])

    MSG([[ I gave up on everything and listened to what Hiyu-san had to say. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0470.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "...It's obvious." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0471.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Erika-nee-sama is the most beautiful girl ever! That photo was just a simple underwear mistake!" ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ca")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0065.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Eh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "H-Hiyu-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The entire venue fell silent. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san next to me looked dumbfounded and stunned, her mouth hanging open, but quickly panicked and lunged forward. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ba")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Hey, that’s not what happened in rehearsal! What are you saying all of a sudden?!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0472.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "What I’m saying is that I’m revealing the truth as instructed, okay?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0473.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "The script I got from Hermes-sama was full of mistakes, so I thought I should properly correct it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ga")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0067.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "H-Hey!! What do you mean by that!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "A-A script...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Was this all staged?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Then what Hermes-nee-sama said was just nonsense?" ]])

    MSG([[ Voices doubting Hermes-san began to rise from the audience seats. ]])

    MSG([[ Amazing. The atmosphere in the venue is now completely controlled by Hiyu-san. ]])

    MSG([[ Whether or not she sensed this, Hiyu-san grabbed the microphone and spoke lively in her usual tone. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0474.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Come on, I haven’t even spilled all of Erika-nee-sama’s truths yet! I’ll keep talking!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ma")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
HIYU_PARTICLE_01(150, -460, 200, -340, 200, 50, 5, 500)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0475.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "First of all, her legs are beautiful! Her skin is smoother and more lovely than any beautifu girl, making me swoon just looking at them!" ]])

RESET_HIYU_PARTICLE(150)

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    【Hermes?】
 "P-Please stop..." ]])

    MSG([[ She quickly paled and lost all vitality. The usual charming idol aura was completely gone. ]])

    MSG([[ She looked like a different person. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0476.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Have you ever seen Erika-nee-sama’s stomach? She has a toned tummy, not ripped, and it’s simply perfect!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0069.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Please, stop already... I beg you..." ]])

HIYU_PARTICLE_01(150, -460, 200, -340, 200, 50, 5, 500)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0477.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I’ve had the chance to touch it a few times by chance, and honestly, just the feeling of her stomach alone is enough for three bowls of rice. Everyone should feel Erika-nee-sama’s tummy too――" ]])


RESET_HIYU_PARTICLE(150)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-600,100)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ARU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0070.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】
 "Enough alreadyーーーーーーーーーーーーー!!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,-500)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ As Hermes-san shouted, a loud howling screech echoed throughout the venue. ]])

    MSG([[ The piercing sound, like a scream, made me and everyone around cover our ears. ]])

    MSG([[ But the situation did not end there―― ]])

    PLAY_SE("SEa042.wav")

    EFFECT_SCREEN(1 , 20 , 40 , 300,false,false)
    WAIT(300)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ae")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-2800,400)

-- //BU：リラ（焦り）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1403.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hey!? Someone bring a fire extinguisher! It looks like the speakers couldn't handle Hermes-chan Senpai's voice and exploded!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2136.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Looking, the speaker was indeed spewing fire and blazing. ]])

    MSG([[ We hurriedly brought fire extinguishers and all worked together to put out the fire. ]])

    MSG([[ … ]])

    MSG([[ After struggling for over ten minutes. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    -- //BU：リラ（悲しみ）、ウラン（悲しみ）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2137.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "The fire is out... that was a close call." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1404.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "That was seriously bad. I heard this auditorium is a pretty old building, so it’s highly flammable too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0912.wav")
    MSG([[
